scripts.ps2: docker exec -u root -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 ps aux
scripts.stop1: docker exec -u root -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 forever stopall
scripts.challenge: run-s challenge0 challenge1 challenge2 challenge3 challenge4 challenge5 challenge6 challenge7 challenge8 challenge9 challenge10
scripts.challenge3: sleep 100 ; docker exec -u nginx -it securethebox-challenge_nginx-modsecurity_1 nginx -s reload
scripts.challenge4: docker exec -u nginx -it securethebox-challenge_nginx-modsecurity_1 apk add nodejs nodejs-npm
scripts.challenge5: docker exec -u nginx -it securethebox-challenge_nginx-modsecurity_1 npm install -g cloudcmd
scripts.challenge6: docker exec -u nginx -it securethebox-challenge_nginx-modsecurity_1 npm install -g forever
scripts.challenge8: docker exec -u juicer -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 npm install -g cloudcmd
scripts.challenge9: docker exec -u juicer -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 npm install -g forever
scripts.challenge10: docker exec -u juicer -it securethebox-challenge_juice-shop_1 forever start /usr/local/bin/cloudcmd --port 7000
